attributes.title: 101 Future Hospitality Days
attributes.description: What will the future of hospitality look like? What are the latest trends and developments in this travel sector? We can't wait to be inspired by the thought leaders and professionals in hospitality and start the conversation about how web3 technology will impact our future. Our colleague will even hold a keynote speech and answer whether web3 is a red flag or green light. Let's find out and connect at 101 Future Hospitality Days 101.

attributes.title: Aviation Festival Americas
attributes.description: Miami Beach is calling! We are visiting this year's Aviation Festival Americas and are proud to be part of introducing new technologies, forming new strategies, and new beginnings for the aviation industry. We are happy to introduce the Camino blockchain as a future-proof solution for Aviation IT and Airport Tech to improve the digital infrastructure and, ultimately, the end-to-end customer experience. We can't wait to meet you in Miami!

attributes.title: Phocuswright Europe
attributes.description: Do you want to join the best networking event in travel? Then you can not miss out on the Phocuswright Europe in Barcelona. Meet our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu, and our Community Manager, Juan Sanchez, and get the chance to inform yourself about the latest news of web3 in travel and to join an event with the most influential leaders of the travel industry.

attributes.title: World Aviation Festival
attributes.description: Our team is excited to be part of the biggest aviation conferences and exhibitions. Meet our Managing Director and Head of Development, Daniel Poerschke, and our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu at World Aviation Festival. Discuss with them how Camino Network can change the aviation industry. See you in Lissabon!

attributes.title: Phocuswright Conference
attributes.description: We are excited to join the Phocuswright Conference. Our Head of Business Development Americas, Jhon Ruiz, and our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu, are visiting the event in Fort Lauderdale and are thrilled to discuss the possibilities of web3 technologies in travel. Join us to learn about the opportunities of the Camino Network for the travel industry.
